text: Anɨb agɨl agak, Ñɨn mɨdup wul olap tap si tap tɨmel gɨnɨg gonɨmuŋ, pɨs kɨd anɨb ak tɨbɨlɨk yoke, pɨs kɨd anep yonɨmuŋ agak. Nak ñɨn kɨd nokom olap yenɨgab ak, pelpel yenɨgaban, tap teplep yɨbɨl agak. Pen ñɨn nak kɨd omɨŋal yenɨgab ak, mab ke yɨneb amnɨgaban, tap tɨmel yɨbɨl agak. Mab ke yɨneb anɨb ak, ma sɨŋ gɨnɨgab agak.
